name: Proto Race
description:
Proto Race takes place in Proto-World, which is a Low Poly Aesthetic World, heavily inspired by over the top 80s Sci-Fi Fantasy Themes, such as:

  • Tron
  • Kung Fury
  • Laser Grid

The Proto Wizard, a crazy computer hacker has created a virtual world and is offering racers a chance at glory if they can beat his creations and his tracks.

Proto Wizard Creations:

  • Monkey IQ: Dumb and Slow
  • Went to College: Average intelligent
  • Graduated: Smug and will cheat in every race by having the faster vehicle.

Proto Wizard Tracks:

  • Test Mode: Basic Track Setup, allows those seeking glory to practice.
  • Race Mode: Advance Track Setup, with all of the Proto Wizards special elements, added such as his crazy speed cannon or hack ways

The Player is Blue and is a normal 80’s themed hero, trying to defeat the Proto Wizard at his own game.
